full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement for Step Attenuator

#### Solicitation and Contract Details

- **Reference Number**: PW-22-01011045
- **Amendment Number**: 1
- **Solicitation Number**: CRC20221107 - 205206
- **Publication Date**: October 24, 2022
- **Tender Closing Date**: November 7, 2022, 2:00 PM Eastern Standard Time
- **Expected Contract Start Date and End Date**: Not specified
- **Tender Status**: Expiré (Expired)

#### Supply Arrangement and Contracting Entity

This tender announcement and resulting contract are issued against the Supply Arrangement (SA) series E60HN-16ELEC (category 4.1). The contracting entity for this tender is Industry Canada, and the resulting contract is expected to be awarded to a supplier from the list of invited bidders under this SA.

#### Tender Description

This request for proposal solicits bids for a step attenuator. The solicitation includes requirements for equivalent products (B3000T) and specifications for delivery. The bidder must submit a firm price in Canadian dollars, including destination and freight charges. The resulting contract will be for 74 units.

#### Technical Evaluation and Basis of Selection

The technical evaluation will consider the bidder's compliance with the requirements and specifications outlined in the tender. The lowest priced responsive bid on an aggregate basis will be recommended for award of a contract.

#### Registration and Publicizing

The invitation to submit a proposal was advertised through the Canada.ca Buy and Sell website and was also distributed to registered potential suppliers under the Supply Arrangement series E60HN-16ELEC.

#### Submission Requirements

Bids must be submitted in writing to Industry Canada by the closing date of November 7, 2022. Proposals must be submitted in accordance with the requirements outlined in the tender documentation.

#### Contact Information

* Samantha Amadio, Contracting Officer
* samantha.amadio@ised-isde.gc.ca

#### Attachment

The tender documentation includes two attachments:

- [Statement of Requirement for Step Attenuator](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/10/24/39e9ee21dbe9b0fb7fe5dc2c7592e941/en-statement_of_requirement_for_step_attenuator.docx)
- [Annex – Mandatory Requirements Evaluation for Step Attenuator](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents
